ComicInfo.Title: Painfully Portland; Kids These Days; Me 'n' Her; In God We Trust; Say, Man...; The Devil Made Her Do It; Something That Happened to Tom Reynolds; Scratchy Screwballs; Let the Punishment Fit the Crime!; Meat for Sale; The He That Walks; The Rose Colored Man; Milt Goes to Work; Roberta and Bitchy; Really Good or "Planet Cube Needs Globes"; Jimmy Corrigan: The Smartest Kid On Earth
